description: A burned serial killer who enters people's dreams and kills them, causing their deaths in the real world.
A masked serial killer who escapes from a mental institution and goes on a killing spree in his hometown.
A deformed and vengeful serial killer who wears a hockey mask and murders camp counselors.
A chainsaw-wielding maniac who wears a mask made of human skin and kills unsuspecting travelers.
A demonic entity who leads a group of sadomasochistic beings called the Cenobites and tortures human souls.
A shape-shifting entity who takes on the form of a clown and terrorizes children in a small town.
A highly aggressive and deadly extraterrestrial creature that stalks and kills the crew of a spaceship.
A vengeful ghost who haunts a videotape and kills anyone who watches it within seven days.
A young girl who becomes possessed by a demonic entity and is subjected to a series of horrific exorcism rituals.
A psychotic and obsessive fan who holds an injured writer captive and subjects him to torture and abuse.
A masked killer who torments a group of high school students and is revealed to have a surprising connection to them.
A hotel owner who develops a split personality and assumes the identity of his deceased mother, committing murder in the process.
A cursed young girl who was thrown into a well and left to die, and whose ghost now haunts a videotape and kills anyone who watches it within seven days.
A vampire who travels from Transylvania to England and preys upon young women, ultimately facing off against a group of heroes led by Professor Van Helsing.
A vengeful ghost who haunts a cursed house and kills anyone who enters it or comes into contact with those who have.
